Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.MessageForwarder
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameManager
public class GameManager
extends MessageForwarder
Handle the game logic during the active play.

    • checkWinConditions

      protected boolean checkWinConditions​(PlayerMove move)
      Check if the current player has made a move that leads to victory.
      Parameters:
      move - The player move containing the information about the worker and the target slot of the move.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean that describe if the player wins or not.
